title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize containers for AI agents using AgentCore Gateway (CNS422)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AgentCore Gateway 为 AI 代理现代化容器 (CNS422)
abstract: In this session, learn how to transform your existing containerized applications into powerful components of modern AI-powered workflows. We'll demonstrate how AgentCore Gateway acts as a bridge, enabling your Amazon EKS-based microservices to seamlessly interact with AI agents without requiring substantial refactoring or rebuilding. Through practical examples and a live demonstration, we'll explore a key modernization pattern that allows organizations to leverage their existing container investments while participating in the emerging landscape of agentic systems. You'll see firsthand how AgentCore Gateway can expose your microservice interfaces, making them instantly accessible to AI agents and enabling participation in complex, automated workflows.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，学习如何将现有的容器化应用程序转变为现代AI驱动工作流的强大组件。我们将演示AgentCore Gateway如何充当桥梁，使基于Amazon EKS的微服务能够与AI代理无缝交互，而无需进行大量重构或重建。通过实际示例和现场演示，我们将探索一种关键的现代化模式，使组织能够利用其现有的容器投资，同时参与到新兴的代理系统领域中。您将亲眼看到AgentCore Gateway如何公开您的微服务接口，使其能够立即被AI代理访问，并参与到复杂的自动化工作流中。
